comedyMovies.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
comedyMovies.description: Deadpool teams up with a variant of Wolverine to prevent the Time Variance Authority from destroying his universe, embarking on a chaotic adventure filled with humor, action, and unexpected twists.

comedyMovies.title: Pitch Perfect 2
comedyMovies.description: It's been three years since the Barden Bellas became the first all-female group to win a national title. All seems well until a botched Lincoln Center performance for the president leads to a scandal that strips them of their performing duties, causing internal tension and strife.

comedyMovies.title: The Hangover
comedyMovies.description: When three friends discover the bridegroom is missing, they must retrace their wild and drunken journey to find him before the wedding. Their attempts lead them to strange and dangerous situations as they piece together the events of the previous night.

comedyMovies.title: Free Guy
comedyMovies.description: A bank teller discovers that he's actually a non-playable character (NPC) in an open-world video game. As he becomes self-aware, he teams up with a player to save his world from being shut down by the game's developers.

comedyMovies.title: Red Notice
comedyMovies.description: An FBI agent pursues the world's most wanted art thief, who is wanted for stealing priceless artifacts. Along the way, they form an unlikely partnership with a con artist, leading to a thrilling and action-packed adventure.

comedyMovies.title: Spirited
comedyMovies.description: A modern musical reimagining of Charles Dickens' classic *A Christmas Carol*, with a comedic twist. The film follows a cynical businessman who is visited by three spirits in an attempt to change his selfish ways during the holiday season.

comedyMovies.title: The Heat
comedyMovies.description: An uptight FBI special agent and a foul-mouthed Boston cop team up to take down a drug lord. While working together to catch the criminal, the two women clash over their contrasting methods and personalities.

comedyMovies.title: 21 Jump Street
comedyMovies.description: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to high school to infiltrate a drug ring. Their comedic journey brings them face-to-face with their teenage selves and puts their partnership to the test.
